translation.es: ¿Era necesario? No tuve nada que ver.

translation.en: She's working for the inspector general, not me. Is she with you?
translation.es: Trabaja con el inspector general, no conmigo. - ¿Está contigo? - Sí. No voluntariamente.

translation.en: Yes. Not voluntarily.
Okay, listen. This is not something I wanna say over the phone.
translation.es: Escucha. No es algo que quiera discutir por teléfono.

translation.en: - I'm at my kid's goddamn school. - What the hell is all of this?
translation.es: Estoy en la maldita escuela de mi hijo. ¿De qué se trata todo esto?

translation.en: We have a problem.
Gemini.
Your old friend, working with Janet Lassiter and her people.
translation.es: Tu viejo amigo trabaja con Janet Lassiter y su gente.

translation.en: I can't stop them.
Okay. Dormov.
Did-- did he have something to do with Gemini?
Dormov, the guy that you had me pop on the train,
translation.es: Dormov. El que me hiciste matar en el tren

translation.en: because you said he was a Russian terrorist.
Was he working for Gemini?
Once upon a time.
So you got me pulling... triggers for Clay Verris.
translation.es: Me hiciste apretar gatillos para Clay Verris.

translation.en: Henry, I regret my lack of candor, but listen--
translation.es: Lamento mi falta de honestidad, pero escucha...

translation.en: How many other times you do this to me, Del?
How many times you spike a file,
send me off to AMF somebody who didn't deserve it?
translation.es: y me mandaste a HNA a alguien que no lo merecía?

translation.en: Never ever. This was a one- off. I swear on my son's life.
translation.es: Jamás. Fue la única vez. Lo juro por la vida de mi hijo.

translation.en: All right. Look, Agent Zakarewski is not a part of this.
translation.es: Mira, la agente Zakarewski no es parte de esto.

translation.en: Henry, we can fix this, I swear. But I need both of you to come back.
translation.es: Podemos arreglar esto, lo juro. Pero necesito que ambos vuelvan.

translation.en: To what, Del?
Okay. Gemini.
What do you know about it?
Privatized paramilitary owned by Clay Verris.
translation.es: Paramilitares privados, dirigidos por Clay Verris.

translation.en: Agency does a lot of business with them. Is there more?
translation.es: La Agencia hace muchos tratos con ellos. ¿Hay algo más?

translation.en: Baron and I served under Verris in the Marines.
translation.es: Baron y yo servimos bajo Verris en los marines.

translation.en: Uh, Panama, Kuwait, Somalia.
After he left the military, he started Gemini,
translation.es: Después de dejar el ejército, fundó Géminis e intentó contratarnos.

translation.en: and tried to hire us. We both told him no.
translation.es: Después de dejar el ejército, fundó Géminis e intentó contratarnos. Ambos nos negamos.

translation.en: Except I was smart enough to move 1,500 miles away.
translation.es: Yo fui listo y me mudé a 2500 km de distancia.

translation.en: Yeah.
- I blew that one. -
Verris gets billions of dollars a year
translation.es: Verris gana millones de dólares por año

translation.en: to take out targets any way he sees fit.
translation.es: eliminando objetivos del modo que quiera.

translation.en: That's Gemini. Off- book kidnappings, tortures.
translation.es: Eso hace Géminis. Secuestros clandestinos, torturas.

translation.en: They're who you call when you need 12 Saudi princes to quietly disappear
translation.es: Los contratas cuando necesitas que desaparezcan 12 príncipes sauditas.

translation.en: or you want somebody to train your death squads.
translation.es: O cuando quieres que alguien entrene a tus escuadrones de la muerte.

translation.en: Six weeks into sniper school,
translation.es: Tras seis semanas en el entrenamiento de tiro,

translation.en: Clay Verris takes me out on this boat about five miles.
translation.es: Clay Verris me lleva en bote a ocho km de la costa.

translation.en: Ties these weights to my ankles, tosses me overboard,
translation.es: Me ata unas pesas en los tobillos, me tira por la borda.

translation.en: tells me tread water as long as I can.
translation.es: Me dice que me mantenga a flote todo lo posible.

translation.en: - And he didn't know about your fear of-- - Of course he did. That was the point.
translation.es: ¿No sabía sobre tu miedo de...? Claro que sí. Fue a propósito.

translation.en: So what did you do?
I tread water for as long as I could.
translation.es: Me mantuve a flote todo lo que pude

translation.en: And then I drowned.
Dead.
He fished me out, paddled my chest.
translation.es: Me sacó, me revivió con choques al pecho.

translation.en: Told me I was now ready to serve under his command.
translation.es: Me dijo que ya estaba listo para servir bajo su mando.

translation.en: A toast.
To the next war... - which is no war. - Which is no war.
translation.es: Por la próxima guerra, para que no haya guerra.

translation.en: No war.
Yeah. We'll figure it out in the morning. - Right now, we could use some shut- eye. - Sure.
translation.es: Lo hablaremos mañana. Ahora deberíamos descansar.

translation.en: - Uh, you folks want one room or-- - Two.
Two. Two.
Well, yeah. I can put him in the garage if you want.
translation.es: Sí. Puede dormir en la cochera si quieres.

translation.en: All right, two rooms will be fine.
Just giving you options. Okay, right this way.
translation.es: Solo les daba opciones. Bueno, acompáñenme.

translation.en: Sniper. Rooftop. I leave, he's gonna follow.
translation.es: Tirador. En el techo. Me iré y él me seguirá.

translation.en: I need you to go with Baron someplace safe. All right.
translation.es: Ve con Baron a un lugar seguro. ¿De acuerdo?

translation.en: Shooter. On the roof.
You're a shitty house guest, you know that?
translation.es: Eres el peor invitado de la historia, ¿lo sabías?

translation.en: - How the hell did they find us? - She's good.
translation.es: ¿Cómo diablos nos encontraron? Ella es buena, es muy buena.

translation.en: She's really good. She just doesn't know what she doesn't know.
translation.es: Ella es buena, es muy buena. Solo le falta experiencia.

translation.en: Take care of her, all right?
- All right. -
Stop right there!
Who are you?
I don't want to shoot you!
Fine.
Don't shoot me.
Mind if I shoot you?
translation.es: ¿Y si yo te disparo a ti?

translation.en: I could've killed you on the roof!
Maybe you should have.
Did they show you a picture of me?
Yeah. You look old.
Kid... you take one step closer...
translation.es: Muchacho, si te acercas un paso más,

translation.en: you're gonna leave me no choice.
- Stop! Stop! Stop! -
Move! Move!
Get out of the way!
- - Out of the way!
Stop! Stop! Stop!
Hands up!
Who the hell was that?
Brogan.
Thank you, sir.
- Thank you, Captain. - No problem.
Your place is burned. Get me somewhere I can see him coming.
translation.es: Tu casa está expuesta. Llévame a donde pueda verlo venir.

translation.en: I wanted to go in there guns blazing,
but she thought the diplomatic approach made more sense.
translation.es: pero ella pensó que la diplomacia tenía más sentido.

translation.en: Yeah, gunfire might've been kinder.
translation.es: Un tiroteo quizá hubiera sido más agradable.

translation.en: - - Great work in there.
- What now? - I need you to get me to Budapest.
translation.es: ¿Ahora qué? Necesito que me lleves a Budapest.

translation.en: - What's in Budapest? - What's in Budapest?
Jack's informant... Yuri.
Uh, these guys aren't... trying to kill me because I want to retire.
translation.es: No tratan de matarme porque me quiero retirar.

translation.en: They're coming after me because they think Jack told me something classified.
translation.es: Me persiguen porque piensan que Jack me dijo algo clasificado.

translation.en: Yuri ought to know about it.
translation.es: Yuri debe saber lo que es.

translation.en: I'm sorry, partner, my Aztec doesn't have that kind of range.
translation.es: Perdón, amigo, mi Aztec no tiene ese rango.

translation.en: Well, I was hoping we'd borrow something that does.
translation.es: Esperaba pedir prestado algo que lo tenga.

translation.en: Maybe a G?
Taking someone's Gulfstream?
I mean, you-- you'd really have to love a guy to do that.
translation.es: Habría que amarte mucho para prestártelo.

translation.en: I know just the feller. Give me a minute.
translation.es: Conozco a alguien. Dame un minuto.

translation.en: Henry?
Did you ever have a kid?
No. Why?
Guy on the motorcycle.
Did you notice anything funny about him?
- I noticed he was very good. - Right.
translation.es: Noté que era muy hábil. Sí.

translation.en: And the face?
Similarity?
Yeah, I noticed that, too.
...you never had a long- term relationship?
No. Not unless we count you.
translation.es: No. No si descarto la nuestra.

translation.en: Is it possible that you could've had a kid without knowing it?
translation.es: ¿Es posible que hayas tenido un hijo sin enterarte?

translation.en: No.
- Then how do you explain-- - Danny.
All right?
Thank you, by the way.
For?
For leaving Baron's apartment so I wouldn't be a target.
translation.es: Por irte del apartamento de Baron para que yo no fuera el objetivo.

translation.en: Coming to get me in Georgia when you could've just run for your life.
translation.es: Por rescatarme en Georgia cuando pudiste huir para salvarte.

translation.en: I just...
translation.es: Yo solo quería subirte a un avión privado

translation.en: wanted to put you on a private plane, and give you a free trip to Hungary.
translation.es: Yo solo quería subirte a un avión privado y regalarte un viaje a Hungría.

translation.en: Where I'm gonna find...
Hungarians.
Right.
When I saw him...
it was like I was seeing a ghost.
translation.es: fue como ver a un fantasma.

translation.en: A ghost with a gun.
Like... every trigger I've ever pulled.
translation.es: Como cada gatillo que he apretado.

translation.en: I told you to stay in Colombia and await orders.
translation.es: Te dije que te quedaras en Colombia y esperaras órdenes.

translation.en: I wanted to talk to you.
He's very good.
He's the best.
That's why I sent you.
translation.es: Por eso te envié a ti.

translation.en: He knew every... move of mine before I made it.
translation.es: Sabía todo lo que yo iba a hacer antes de que lo hiciera.

translation.en: I'd have him... right there, and I'd take the shot...
and... he'd be gone.
Like a ghost.
Did you get a look at his face?
Not really. I-- I saw him up the stairs, through a dirty mirror.
translation.es: La verdad, no. Lo vi en las escaleras a través de un espejo sucio.

translation.en: I thought you were on the roof.
translation.es: Creí que estabas en el techo.

translation.en: I was. He got a line on me.
translation.es: Sí, en su línea de tiro. Tuve que saltar.

translation.en: - I had to jump down. - What do we always drill?
You hold the high ground. You put his back against the wall,
translation.es: Mantienes la posición elevada. Lo pones entre la espada y la pared y no lo dejas escapar.

translation.en: and you don't let him go.
translation.es: Lo pones entre la espada y la pared y no lo dejas escapar.

translation.en: I know that.
The whole thing was weird.
It was... wiggy.
How?
I don't know, it was as if I were... watching it all.
translation.es: No sé. Como si yo estuviera observando todo.

translation.en: Who is he?
Junior, this thing that you're struggling with, this strangeness,
translation.es: Junior, lo que te está atormentando, esta rareza, es el miedo.

translation.en: it's fear.
Don't hate it.
Lean into it.
Embrace it,
and then overcome it. You...
translation.es: abrázalo y luego supéralo. Estás muy cerca, hijo.

translation.en: are right on the threshold, son.
This close.
You hungry?
Um... yes, sir.
Bowl of cereal sound good?
Yes, sir.
Go!
- Grenade! - Hang on.
Thank you! That's it! Back up!
Hurry up!
- Everybody back to one. - Everybody back to one.
translation.es: ¡Rápido! ¡Todos a primera posición! ¡Vuelvan a primera posición!

translation.en: - Back to one! - Let's go!
Lots of new faces. Yep.
They'll be the first boots on the ground in Yemen.
translation.es: Serán las primeras tropas en Yemen.

translation.en: Do they understand the rules of engagement or just, whatever moves, they shoot it?
translation.es: ¿Entienden las reglas de combate o solo le disparan a todo lo que se mueva?

translation.en: They're elite. They're disciplined.
And if they get a clean shot at their target
translation.es: Si tienen un tiro limpio a su objetivo

translation.en: through an apartment window, they'll take it.
You should think about that on your way to Budapest.
translation.es: Piensa en eso de camino a Budapest.

translation.en: Henry's just landed there.
You're moving out.
Aniko?
Thank you for your time.
Here are the samples.
This I can do for you in... two days.
translation.es: Tendré los resultados en dos días.

translation.en: This I need in two hours.
We got a meeting with Yuri.
He agreed to sit with us.
You all right?
I think I know why he's as good as you, Henry.
translation.es: Creo que sé por qué es tan bueno como tú.

translation.en: He is you.
What?
There's a DNA lab here. I gave them samples.
translation.es: Hay un laboratorio de ADN aquí. Les di muestras.

translation.en: Yours and the baseball cap he was wearing.
translation.es: De ti y de la gorra de béisbol que traía.

translation.en: He just-- he looks so much like you, I thought he had to be your son, so I...
translation.es: Se parecía tanto a ti, pensé que tenía que ser tu hijo, así que...

translation.en: They did three tests.
Your DNA and his.
translation.es: Tu ADN y el de él.

translation.en: All three came back identical.
Not close. Identical.
As in the same person.
He's your clone.
They thought I'd made a mistake that I give them the samples
translation.es: Pensaron que fue un error, que les había dado muestras

translation.en: of the same person, but I didn't.
translation.es: Pensaron que fue un error, que les había dado muestras de la misma persona. Pero no.

translation.en: He is you.
- How's that even possible? - It's complicated, but it's doable.
translation.es: ¿Cómo es posible? Es complicado, pero se puede hacer.

translation.en: All you'd really need is a surrogate mother,
translation.es: Solo se necesita una madre sustituta y una muestra de ADN.

translation.en: - and a DNA sample. - If they could clone a person,
translation.es: Solo se necesita una madre sustituta y una muestra de ADN. Si pueden clonar a una persona,

translation.en: you-- you'd think they'd clone more doctors or scientists,
translation.es: uno creería que clonarían a médicos o científicos,

translation.en: not... me.
They could've cloned Nelson Mandela.
Nelson Mandela couldn't kill a man on a moving train
translation.es: Mandela no podría matar a alguien

translation.en: from two kilometers away.
translation.es: en un tren a dos km de distancia.

translation.en: Yuri.
Mr. Brogan.
Before we begin, I must confess, I have admired your work for many years.
translation.es: Antes de empezar, debo confesar que he admirado su trabajo durante años.

translation.en: Wait. - So... you know who I am? -
A longtime listener, first- time caller, as they say in your country.
translation.es: Oyente por mucho tiempo, primera vez en llamar, como dicen en su país.

translation.en: I would congratulate you...  ...on your retirement, but...
your last job has loose ends, yes?
translation.es: pero su último trabajo dejó cabos sueltos, ¿sí?

translation.en: Yeah, well, my government lied to me, then tried to kill me
translation.es: Mi gobierno me mintió e intentó matarme,

translation.en: - if that's what you mean. - Yes.
translation.es: si a eso se refiere. Sí.

translation.en: In Russia, we call that Tuesday.
translation.es: En Rusia, lo llamamos un martes,

translation.en: But Americans... it hurts your feelings.
translation.es: pero en EE. UU. se ofenden.

translation.en: So...
So, why was Dormov trying to go back to Russia and why was I sent to kill him?
translation.es: ¿Por qué Dormov trataba de volver a Rusia y por qué me enviaron a matarlo?

translation.en: Yes, down to business. Very American.
translation.es: Sí, directo al grano. Clásico estadounidense.

translation.en: You are a busy man.
We were both friends with Jack.
He was a good man.
I'm mourning his death, like you.
But the reason you are here... and I have not killed you...
translation.es: Pero la razón por la que está aquí, y no lo he matado...

translation.en: yet...
is we share a common enemy.
translation.es: es porque tenemos un enemigo en común.

translation.en: Clay Verris.
He lured Dormov to the West, funded his lab.
translation.es: Atrajo a Dormov a Occidente, financió su laboratorio.

translation.en: And now you have met the fruits of their labor.
translation.es: Ahora usted conoció el fruto de su trabajo.

translation.en: Dolly the sheep was cloned in '96.
translation.es: La oveja Dolly fue clonada en 1996.

translation.en: - But in '95-- - I was the sheep.
translation.es: - Pero en 1995... - Yo fui la oveja.

translation.en: Take it as a compliment.
And you are the only one.
With your DNA, Verris raised the boy as his own son.
translation.es: Con su ADN, Verris crio al niño como a su propio hijo.

translation.en: Trained him to be the perfect assassin.
translation.es: Lo entrenó para ser el asesino perfecto.

translation.en: So why was Dormov trying to leave?
For years, we tried to lure him back. Nothing.
translation.es: Durante años tratamos de traerlo de vuelta. Nada.

translation.en: Then last year, they had a falling out.
translation.es: El año pasado, tuvieron un desacuerdo.

translation.en: - Dormov got scared, reached out to me. - So, I--
translation.es: Dormov se asustó, me contactó. Así que yo...

translation.en: that still doesn't explain why I was sent to kill him.
translation.es: Eso no explica por qué me enviaron a matarlo.

translation.en: We have indications Dormov made a breakthrough.
translation.es: Hay señales de que Dormov logró un gran avance.

translation.en: Modified human DNA.
A path to mass production.
But Dormov wanted soldiers to be stronger, smarter.
translation.es: Pero Dormov quería soldados más fuertes e inteligentes.

translation.en: Verris...
Verris wanted something else.
What something else?
Mr. Brogan...
you are the best at what you do.
translation.es: usted es el mejor en lo que hace.

translation.en: But still you get tired.
translation.es: Pero aun así se cansa. Tiene miedos, dudas.

translation.en: You have fears, doubts. You feel pain, perhaps remorse.
translation.es: Pero aun así se cansa. Tiene miedos, dudas. Siente dolor, tal vez remordimiento.

translation.en: You have a conscience.
This makes you human...
but suboptimal as a soldier.
translation.es: pero no es lo óptimo para un soldado.

translation.en: Less than perfect.
Less profitable.
Clayton Verris is playing God with DNA.
translation.es: Clayton Verris juega a Dios con el ADN.

translation.en: He must be stopped.
If it's that dangerous, why not send a missile?
translation.es: Si es tan peligroso, ¿por qué no disparar un misil?

translation.en: Blow up his lab.
That is what we're doing.
Except you... are the missile.
translation.es: Excepto que usted es el misil.

translation.en: I wish you luck.
Oh, one last thing.
Your escape from home two days ago?
translation.es: ¿El escape de su casa hace dos días?

translation.en: Amazing work. I was on the edge of my seat.
translation.es: Un trabajo increíble. Estaba clavado a mi asiento.

translation.en: Wait. What?
How the hell do you know about that?
I'm a big fan. What can I say?
translation.es: Soy un gran fan. ¿Qué quiere que le diga?

translation.en: If even half of what he's saying is true...
translation.es: Si la mitad de lo que dice es cierto,

translation.en: we gotta talk to this kid.
translation.es: tenemos que hablar con el chico.

translation.en: You're not gonna be safe until you do.
translation.es: No estarás a salvo hasta que lo hagas.

translation.en: Oh, so you think if your 50 year old self showed up,
translation.es: Si tu yo de 50 años se apareciera

translation.en: and told you you were her clone, that would make you calmer?
translation.es: y te dijera que era tu clon, ¿te calmarías?

translation.en: Fifty- one.
- What? - Just saying...
- You know you're 51, Henry? - I'm aware of it.
Right.
He's the mirror you don't want to look into, Henry.
translation.es: Es el espejo en el que no quieres mirar.

translation.en: But he's our best shot at getting to Verris.
translation.es: Pero es nuestra mejor oportunidad de llegar a Verris.

translation.en: Janet Lassiter?
Who wants to know?
Got a message for you, ma'am... from a man who transferred a 1,000 dollars
translation.es: Tengo un mensaje para usted, de un hombre que transfirió mil dólares

translation.en: into my Feathercoin account just to make sure you got it.
translation.es: a mi cuenta de Feathercoin para que se lo diera.

translation.en: Does this person have a name?
His name is A 1,000 Dollars Into My Feathercoin Account.
translation.es: Se llama Mil dólares en mi cuenta de Feathercoin.

translation.en: Hello, Janet. Before you try to kill me again, consider this.
translation.es: Hola, Janet. Antes de que intentes matarme de nuevo, considera esto:

translation.en: Your home address is 1362 Carrol Grove.
The security alarm code is 1776.
You awaken at 6:12 every morning,
translation.es: Despiertas a las 6:12 de la mañana

translation.en: and stop for your decaf soy latte with an extra shot by 6:42.
translation.es: y compras tu latte descafeinado con leche de soya a las 6:42.

translation.en: Every night you stand in front of your huge living room window,
translation.es: Todas las noches te paras frente al ventanal de tu sala

translation.en: sipping a Jose Cuervo margarita...
with Forensic Files on the TV...
translation.es: viendo Archivos forenses en la tele,

translation.en: wearing your nice, comfy sweatpants.
This is Lassiter.
There are shooters at your ten and two.
translation.es: Hay francotiradores a las diez y dos.

translation.en: Get up off of that chair. You will be AMF'ed.
translation.es: Levántate de la silla o vas a ser HNA.

translation.en: Now, if I thought the world needed another me, I would've had a kid.
translation.es: Si creyera que el mundo necesitara otro yo, habría tenido un hijo.

translation.en: The program predates my arrival at the Agency. You must know that.
translation.es: El programa empezó antes de que yo llegara a la Agencia. Lo debes saber.

translation.en: Yeah. Perfect D.C. answer. Something goes wrong, duck!
translation.es: Sí, la respuesta perfecta de Washington: Si algo sale mal, esquiva el golpe.

translation.en: Tip the bike guy.
You can go.
Now, I have your agent with me against her will.
translation.es: Tengo a tu agente conmigo contra su voluntad.

translation.en: Danielle Zakarewski.
She wants to come in.
- Fine. - Uh, like me, she is a patriot.
translation.es: Muy bien. Al igual que yo, es una patriota.

translation.en: Unlike me, she still wants to spend the next couple decades
translation.es: A diferencia de mí, quiere pasar las próximas décadas

translation.en: scoring touchdowns for you assholes.
Her safety is nonnegotiable.
Ten and two, Janet.
translation.es: A las diez y a las dos, Janet.

translation.en: Decaf soy latte with an extra shot for Janet.
translation.es: ¿Descafeinado con leche de soya para Janet?

translation.en: The only person I'll turn her over to
translation.es: La única persona a quien se la entregaré

translation.en: is the guy you sent after me in Cartagena.
translation.es: es al tipo que mandaron por mí a Cartagena.

translation.en: Don't even think about sending anybody else.
translation.es: Ni pienses en mandar a nadie más.

translation.en: Family reunion.
- Very sweet. - Yeah. Keep it up.
translation.es: Una reunión familiar. Qué bonito. Sí. Buen chiste.

translation.en: You'll be the first person I ever killed for free.
translation.es: Serás la primera persona que mate gratis.

translation.en: How quickly can you get him to Budapest?
translation.es: ¿Qué tan rápido puedes mandarlo a Budapest?

translation.en: Five minutes?
Good.
She'll be in the courtyard of the Vajdahunyad Castle
translation.es: Ella estará en el patio del castillo Vajdahunyad

translation.en: at midnight tonight.
Enjoy your latte.
What's AMF?
Adios, motherfucker.
How the hell does he know we're here?
translation.es: ¿Cómo se enteró de que estamos aquí?

translation.en: This is gonna work, right?
Yes.
How do you know?
I know his taste.
Wait, are you saying you're attracted to me?
Me? Now? Hell, no.
But the younger, less- mature version, maybe.
translation.es: Pero a la versión joven y menos madura, tal vez.

translation.en: When I came for you... in Georgia...
I didn't have to think about that.
It was instinct.
He was born with that, too.
Besides, he wants me.
Right.
Lovely courtyard.
I'm sorry, ma'am.
Before we go any farther, I'm gonna need you to strip.
translation.es: Antes de seguir, necesito que se desvista.

translation.en: I beg your pardon?
I need to be certain you're not wearing a wire.
translation.es: Necesito comprobar que no trae un micrófono.

translation.en: Okay, first of all...
ma'am?
I was raised to respect my elders.
translation.es: Me enseñaron a respectar a los mayores.

translation.en: Take your clothes off, please.
Turn around, please.
I see you like to be thorough.

translation.en: No?
He was on his way to Yemen. Now, thanks to you,
translation.es: Él estaba de camino a Yemen. Ahora, gracias a ti, su lugar será ocupado por alguien con padres.

translation.en: his place is gonna be taken by someone with parents.
translation.es: Ahora, gracias a ti, su lugar será ocupado por alguien con padres.

translation.en: Someone who feels pain... fear,
which we had edited out of him. Someone with just as many weaknesses
translation.es: Cosas que habíamos eliminado en él. Alguien con tantas debilidades

translation.en: as the terrorists that we're trying to kill.
translation.es: como los terroristas que queremos matar.

translation.en: And you're gonna tell me that's better?
So, why not make a whole army of them?
translation.es: Entonces, ¿por qué no hacer un ejército de ellos?

translation.en: Yeah. Why not?
Think how many American families we could spare.
translation.es: Piensa en cuántas familias no tendrían que sufrir.

translation.en: Nobody's son or daughter would ever have to die.
translation.es: No tendría que morir ningún hijo o hija de nadie.

translation.en: No vet comes home with PTSD and kills himself.
translation.es: Ningún veterano con estrés postraumático se suicidaría.

translation.en: We can keep the whole world safe without any actual grief.
translation.es: Podríamos mantener el mundo a salvo sin ninguna tristeza.

translation.en: So, who would I be hurting?
You're talking about people, Clay.
Henry...
this is the most humane thing that Gemini's ever done.
translation.es: Esta es la cosa más humana que Géminis ha hecho.

translation.en: How many more of me are running around out there?
translation.es: ¿Cuántos más como yo están allá afuera?

translation.en: There's only one you, Junior.
He was a weapon.
You're my son.
And I love you...
as much as any father ever loved any kid.
translation.es: Tanto como cualquier padre jamás ha amado a un hijo.

translation.en: I don't have a father.
Goodbye, Clay.
Hey, hey.
So, what the hell are we gonna do, huh?
Gonna turn him in?
They're not gonna try him. They're not gonna shut down his lab.
translation.es: ¿Entregarlo? No van a juzgarlo. No van a cerrar su laboratorio.

translation.en: - We have to end this right now. - Hey.
translation.es: Tenemos que acabar con esto ahora. Oye.

translation.en: Look at me.
Look at me.
You pull that trigger,
and you're gonna break something inside of yourself...
translation.es: vas a romper algo dentro de ti...

translation.en: that'll never get fixed again.
Don't.
Let it go.
Give it to me.
You don't want those ghosts.
Trust me.
You should know better than that.
translation.es: Sabes que eso no te conviene.

translation.en: Surprised you give a shit.
Well, we can't be friends anymore.
translation.es: Bueno, ya no podemos ser amigos.

translation.en: Because you did let them try to kill me.
translation.es: Porque dejaste que trataran de matarme.

translation.en: But doesn't mean I want to see you drink yourself to death.
translation.es: No significa que quiera que te mates con alcohol.

translation.en: The Gemini lab's been dismantled.
Cloning program is history.
translation.es: Las clonaciones pasaron a la historia.

translation.en: And Junior?
He's untouchable.
No one will bother him... ever.
And we checked. There are no more clones.
translation.es: Lo verificamos. No existen más clones.

translation.en: What about you?
IG called.
I'm looking at charges, but if I bury Janet...
translation.es: Enfrentaré cargos, pero si declaro contra Janet, me ofrecerán un trato.

translation.en: I can make a deal.
translation.es: pero si declaro contra Janet, me ofrecerán un trato.

translation.en: Well, she earned it.
I'm really sorry, Henry.
- Take care, Del. - Yeah. You, too.
And happy retirement.
Hey.
Hey.
Good to see you.
Uh, congrats on the promotion. I hear they got big plans.
translation.es: Felicidades por el ascenso. Tienen grandes planes para ti.

translation.en: Well, after you, - pretty sure I can handle anything. -
translation.es: Después de ti, puedo con lo que sea.

translation.en: How have you been?
Good. I just, uh, settled Baron's estate,
translation.es: - ¿Cómo has estado? - Bien. Arreglé la herencia de Baron.

translation.en: scattered his ashes in the Caribbean.
translation.es: Esparcí sus cenizas en el Caribe.

translation.en: I don't know. All I want to do now is put some good in the world.
translation.es: Ahora solo quiero hacer del mundo un lugar mejor.

translation.en: I just got to figure out how.
translation.es: Solo tengo que averiguar cómo hacerlo.

translation.en: - Yeah, you will. - Hmm.
You sleeping okay?
Uh, better.
- No ghosts? - Not like before.
And I actually looked in a mirror the other day.
translation.es: De hecho, me miré al espejo el otro día.

translation.en: - Really? - It wasn't horrendous.
Speaking of mirrors...
- Catch you later. - See you later, man.
Hey.
- What's this? - This is you.
Passport, birth certificate, driver's license.
translation.es: Pasaporte, acta de nacimiento, licencia de conducir.

translation.en: - Apparently you got pretty good credit. -
I love the name you chose.
translation.es: Me encanta el nombre que escogiste.

translation.en: Jackson?
translation.es: ¿Jackson? Es el apellido de mi madre.

translation.en: - It was my mother's name. - Hey, she was my mother first.
translation.es: ¿Jackson? Es el apellido de mi madre. Oye, primero fue mi madre.

translation.en: - Yeah, yeah. - Don't you yeah, yeah me, young man.
translation.es: Sí, sí. No me vengas con sí, sí, jovencito.

translation.en: Come on. I know a great place for lunch.
translation.es: Vámonos. Conozco un buen lugar para comer.

translation.en: - So, you settled on a major yet? - Oh, leaning towards engineering.
translation.es: ¿Ya escogiste una carrera? Me estoy inclinando por ingeniería.

translation.en: - Engineering? - Uh.
Yeah, you should listen to her.
Uh, if I were you, which I sort of am, I'd go with computer science.
translation.es: Si yo fuera tú, y en cierto modo lo soy, estudiaría informática.

translation.en: Save that for grad school.
translation.es: Guarda eso para la maestría. Empieza con humanidades.

translation.en: - You want to start in humanities. - Okay, don't listen to her.
translation.es: Guarda eso para la maestría. Empieza con humanidades. - No le hagas caso. - No le hagas caso a él.

translation.en: - Don't listen to him. - Guys?
translation.es: - No le hagas caso. - No le hagas caso a él.

translation.en: - You need a grounding in the classics. - Well, excuse me,
translation.es: Hay que leer los clásicos. Disculpa, estoy tratando de hablar conmigo mismo.

translation.en: - I'm trying to talk with myself here. - Guys.
translation.es: Disculpa, estoy tratando de hablar conmigo mismo.

translation.en: You're talking to yourself, but you're not talking to him.
translation.es: Hablas contigo mismo, no con él.

translation.en: Look, I-- I just made a lot of mistakes when I was young--
translation.es: Yo cometí muchos errores cuando era joven.

translation.en: And I'd actually like to make some of those mistakes myself.
translation.es: A mí me gustaría cometer algunos de esos errores.

translation.en: What I'm trying to say is, I made them already, so you don't have to.
translation.es: Lo que digo es que ya los cometí, tú no tienes que hacerlo.

translation.en: - Yeah, but he's not you. - Okay, everybody. Chill the hell out.
translation.es: - Sí, pero él no es tú. - Bueno, cálmense todos.

translation.en: I'm gonna be okay.
If you're okay...
I'm okay.
- - What?
I just can't believe that in 30 years, I'm gonna look like you.
translation.es: No puedo creer que en 30 años, me vaya a ver como tú.

translation.en: - What? Please. You wish. -
Boy, you better hope you look like me in-- in 30 years.
translation.es: Más te vale verte como yo en 30 años.

translation.en: This is 50- year- old, mature man meat you're looking at.
translation.es: Soy un hombre de 50 años, maduro en plena forma, eso estás viendo.

translation.en: - Fifty- one. - I brush, I floss, I work hard.
translation.es: Cincuenta y uno. Me lavo los dientes, uso hilo dental, trabajo duro.

translation.en: When you're 50, I bet you won't be dragging your ass
translation.es: A los 50 años, no creo que arrastres tu trasero

translation.en: around the track every morning like I do.
translation.es: corriendo todas las mañanas como yo.

translation.en: In fact, we can race now.
translation.es: De hecho, hagamos una carrera ahora.

translation.en: We can race right now. We'll take it to the corner right now.
translation.es: Podemos hacerla ahora. Una carrera a la esquina ahora mismo.
